channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @TheSpicedLife @melania_jacket @igorsushko @kamilkazani Thanks! Bookmarked.

@TheSpicedLife @melania_jacket @igorsushko @kamilkazani Due to uneven destruction in the world wars, some parts of Europe are _very_ old (e.g. I once nonchalantly ate a picnic lunch on the grass of a Roman amphitheater off a random side street a in rural English village), while in others nearly everything is less than 75 years old.
@TheSpicedLife @melania_jacket @igorsushko @kamilkazani YMMV, but this is a list of 140 accounts I have bookmarked over the past month: https://t.co/Kar1GVeTmy
@IrenaeanTerror @mrsorokaa As long as they promise to speak only Russian and pledge their undying loyalty to the Tsar?

@TheSpicedLife @melania_jacket @igorsushko A FSB analyst has had a long-running correspondence with a well-known Russian anti-prison-torture activist who is currently living in France. At least seven of those letters have been forwarded to @igorsushko since the beginning of the war, and he has kindly translated them.

@PFemme2 @JuliaDavisNews @oneunderscore__ Russia has always had limited access to trade w/o friendly regimes in regions today known as Belarus and Ukraine. If they lose Ukraine, eventually theyâ€™ll lose #Georgia, and then #Tatarstan, and by then no one will be buying gas anymore; #Moscovy will be left with the fur trade. https://t.co/i691bTGCN8
@StephenElsberry @PFemme2 @JuliaDavisNews @oneunderscore__ â€¦ or for Ukraine to shut off existing lines from Russia to Europe. https://t.co/1N3JxU0ql3
@igorsushko Open-source tool to contact random Russians via telephone, SMS, WhatsApp messages, or e-mail: https://t.co/KJ5QLxQrGj https://t.co/unbljLLVd9
@flobo09 Are they just using Edge #WebView in file explorer? Apparently itâ€™s just a prototype operating systemâ€¦

@stevecalamia @horsemankukka @JosephPolitano People tend to have fairly narrow viewing horizons, too. Look at debates a region has (e.g. health care policy debates) and compare how much time they spend arguing over hypotheticals and projections vs. how little detailed discourse there is about working models elsewhere.
@schneierblog The tweet referred to by the blog: https://t.co/lmSjlXmVtF

@dangerwookie @igorsushko Yes to the fear part, but contrasting that, this letter says that theyâ€™re not expecting the â€˜westâ€™ to react with force, but to capitulate. Also, an earlier letter mentioned a crack-down at the #FSB and that the author was exhausted and burnt out. Lots of variables.

@dangerwookie @igorsushko Yeah, he didnâ€™t explain until the following letter, but I imagine the recipient (with whom he has had a long-running correspondence) could see from context that these were not the analystâ€™s own thoughts but rather the analyst retelling of a plan being formulated inside the FSB.
